original_text: And to every beast of the earth and to every bird of the heavens and to everything that creeps on the earth, everything that has the breath of life, I have given every green plant for food.” And it was so.
korean_text: 또 땅의 모든 짐승과 하늘의 모든 새와 생명이 있어 땅에 기는 모든 것에게는 내가 모든 푸른 풀을 먹을 거리로 주노라 하시니 그대로 되니라

sentences.original_text: And to every beast of the earth
and to every bird of the heavens
and to everything that creeps on the earth
everything that has the breath of life
I have given every green plant for food
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 모든 푸른 식물을 먹이로 주었다
